channel.title: [Project Annihilation-Hyperion]Need assistance implementing new models
channel.description:
Hello, I am interested in adding new models to the Annihilation source (Based on Hyperion) and have run into trouble.
I have NO idea how to get this even started. I looked at a few guides on the models page, but Hyperion doesnt seem to be in any of them. Do I need to create a new Model Handler class or something, that loads all these .dats? I am open to any suggestions, please let me know.
Thank you, -Luke

item.title: [Project Annihilation-Hyperion]Need assistance implementing new models
